alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 8:50PM MST until October 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Western Mogollon Rim, Black Mesa, Chinle Valley, and and adjacent areas of the Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday, with the strongest winds expected tonight into the early morning hours.. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
